attributes.action: A Recreational drug use Check for All Police, CPS, Courts and Ministers
attributes.additional_details: for further petition evidence, information & research please visit my petitions website at www.bentcop.boards.net and the petitions main hosting page at www.bentcop.biz. The main particular evidence of this cause to obtain is the actual goal of the petition.
attributes.background: The Police and Government do not condone recreational Drug use. To Establish that they are being honest to the Public I call for Police Officers, justice staff  & Mp's to be tissue tested.
